mapper.select: SELECT seq, regtime, aaid, idfa, agency, secondary_publisher, campaign, campaign_id, channel, ad_set_name, ad_set_id, ad_name, ad_id, click_id, event_name, event_timestamp, is_attributed, bundle_id, app_name, app_version, language, os, os_version, client_ip, country, device_id, goal_id, user_agent FROM postback_tune WHERE seq=#{seq} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO postback_tune ( regtime, aaid, idfa, agency, secondary_publisher, campaign, campaign_id, channel, ad_set_name, ad_set_id, ad_name, ad_id, click_id, event_name, event_timestamp, is_attributed, bundle_id, app_name, app_version, language, os, os_version, client_ip, country, device_id, goal_id, user_agent ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{aaid}, #{idfa}, #{agency}, #{secondary_publisher}, #{campaign}, #{campaign_id}, #{channel}, #{ad_set_name}, #{ad_set_id}, #{ad_name}, #{ad_id}, #{click_id}, #{event_name}, #{event_timestamp}, #{is_attributed}, #{bundle_id}, #{app_name}, #{app_version}, #{language}, #{os}, #{os_version}, #{client_ip}, #{country}, #{device_id}, #{goal_id}, #{user_agent} )
